sample_docs: Personal Upgrade to get the best of LastPass with flexible sharing and emergency access. Premium Families Business Simply and securely connect employees to work, from access to authentication. Auto-pilot for all your passwords LastPass removes obstacles, letting you get back to the things you love most. and go Once you save a password in LastPass, you'll always have it when you need it; logging in is fast and easy. Simplify online shopping When you're ready to make a purchase, your profile will fill all your payment and shipping details for you. Generate strong passwords The built-in password generator creates long, randomized passwords that protect against hacking. Store digital records Insurance cards, memberships, Wi-Fi passwords... keep all your notes safe and easy to find. Share effortlessly Some things shouldn't be sent in a text. Conveniently and safely share passwords and notes with anyone. Prepare for the unknown Let trusted friends and family access your LastPass account in the event of an emergency or crisis. FREE! Take it everywhere Save a password once, and it's instantly available on all your devices. LastPass goes everywhere you do. Trusted by millions LastPass is trusted by industry experts worldwide You deserve the best in security. LastPass keeps your information private, secure, and hidden (even from us). 17.8 Million People Trust LastPass 61,000 Businesses Use LastPass Average Rating on the Chrome Web Store Based on 27,600 Reviews "#1 most preferred password manager" — Source: Lab42 Research Survey, 1,100 Respondents, 2017 Choose a plan that works for you Free $0 1 user Access on all devices One-to-one sharing Save & fill passwords Password generator Secure notes Security challenge Multi-factor authentication Get LastPass Free Includes a free 30-day trial of Premium Premium $3 /month 1 user Premium includes everything in Free , plus: One-to-many sharing Emergency access Advanced multi-factor options Priority tech support LastPass for applications 1GB encrypted file storage Go Premium Start a Trial Billed $36 USD annually Families $4 /month 6 users Families includes everything in Premium , plus: 6 Premium licenses Group and share items in folders Family manager dashboard Buy Now Start a Trial Billed $48 USD annually Teams $4 /user /month Simple and secure password management Recommended teams of 50 or less A vault for every user Shared folders Standard security policies Basic reporting Zero-knowledge security model Start a Trial Buy Now Billed $48 USD annually per user* Enterprise $6 /user /month Secure every access point Integrated SSO and password manager 1,200+ pre-integrated SSO apps 100+ customizable policies Centralized Admin dashboard Flexible integrations In-depth reporting Zero-knowledge security model Start a Trial Contact Us Billed $72 USD annually per user* MFA $3 /user /month Intelligent authentication, without the complexity. Celebrating 10 years of Password Security LastPass launched ten years ago and was founded on a mission to provide seamless password security for individuals and businesses alike. LastPass Timeline See how LastPass has grown since 2008 2008 LastPass is born April 2008 Four security-minded friends join forces to build a secure password manager that can be used anywhere, anytime. LastPass Premium arrives March 2009 We launch our signature offering to give users complete peace of mind for their passwords. Bad news for passwords October 2009 Thousands of leaked passwords are analyzed; researchers find that 92% of people use the same password everywhere. Security Challenge is Live January 2010 We release our free tool that identifies weak, duplicate, or compromised sites and passwords in your vault. LastPass Enterprise launches February 2010 We saw a gap in business security and wanted to solve it by making company-wide password management easy. 1 million users January 2011 We reach 1 million LastPass users! Every single customer is vital to our growth. Fresh, new space April 2012 Fairfax got a new tenant! Our 15 employees move into an awesome new office space. New bug bounty program July 2013 We're the first password manager to incentivize security researchers to help improve our product via BugCrowd. 3.0 brings new design, new experience November 2013 New release revamps the user experience and interface for simplified use. Heartbleed Bug vulnerability April 2014 This weakness in OpenSSL, used by roughly 2/3 of websites at the time, allows attackers to access and steal data. #IceBucketChallenge goes viral August 2014 The LastPass team douses themselves in buckets of ice water to raise awareness for ALS. Scary truth of passwords September 2014 An analysis of 5M leaked Gmail logins shows that 123456 is still the most-used password. 10,000 Businesses on LastPass January 2015 We surpass 10K companies using LastPass Enterprise to secure their sensitive data and passwords. LastPass joins the LogMeIn family October 2015 We are acquired by LogMeIn, one of the world's top SaaS companies, based in Boston. LastPass gets a makeover January 2016 We unveil a new logo and look for our brand with the launch of LastPass 4.0! LastPass Authenticator is introduced March 2016 We launch our own free, simple multi-factor authentication app to boost security for our users. LastPass Teams launches November 2016 We launch a new solution to allow smaller groups to safely store and share passwords with each other. LastPass achieves SOC 2 compliance November 2016 To further our commitment to security and privacy, we complete our first of many rigorous audits required for SOC 2. Free mobile syncing becomes available November 2016 We break barriers as the only password manager to offer the syncing of passwords to any device for free. LastPass Families launches October 2017 Securely and easily share with up to 5 other family members with our newest addition to the lineup. LastPass Supports Autofill on Android March 2018 LastPass officially supports Android Oreo, which allows auto-saving and filling of passwords on mobile apps. Share LastPass with friends Trouble convincing your friends and family to finally use a password manager? Check out our new infographic for 10 ways to convince your loved ones to take control of their cybersecurity with LastPass. See Infographic Bring LastPass to work Trying to convince your boss to approve company-wide password management software? Use these 10 strategies to finally get that sign-off and get your business passwords secured. We're solving the password problem all across campus. With 81 percent of data breaches caused by weak or reused passwords*, there is no better time to deliver password management with LastPass to your campus. Source: 2017 Verizon Data Breach Investigations Report. FOR STUDENTS & STAFF Give everyone a tool to improve their passwords. LastPass removes obstacles, letting staff and students get back to work. and go Staff and students won't have to type or recall any of their passwords. LastPass saves and fills their logins for them. Generate strong passwords Anywhere you create a new account, LastPass is there too. Generate strong passwords for websites and apps in just a click from their sign-up forms. Share effortlessly Convenient sharing options are built into the LastPass vault which removes the need to resort to insecure options like email or chat. FOR ADMINS Gain oversight and control over every single login. When passwords are created and managed for users, secure password habits become second nature. Proven security model LastPass is SOC2 Type2 certified with zero-knowledge encryption and vetted by third parties and industry experts through a bug bounty program. Custom pricing for education All-inclusive packages for students, faculty, staff, and even, alumni with education-specific pricing. Partnering for successful campus-wide rollout To drive adoption, we provide full deployment support including a dedicated Customer Success Manager, self-service training portal and onsite training for admins, faculty, and staff. LASTPASS + CAUDIT Affordable password management across your entire campus LastPass and Caudit have partnered to create turnkey packages for higher education institutions across Australia and New Zealand. Unlimited LastPass Enterprise and Premium services Each CAUDIT + LastPass package includes unlimited quantities of LastPass Enterprise and Premium to secure every password, from business to personal. Proven zero-knowledge security model LastPass is built on a zero-knowledge security model that is vetted and trusted by Caudit. Streamlined fulfillment tools and Educational resources Simply deploy LastPass campus-wide to increase adoption while reducing onboarding time and support costs. Guide Identity 101 for SMBs: A Guide to the Benefits and Features of Identity Solutions Learn why Identity matters, what an Identity solution is, and how an Identity solution can help your business. How can an Identity solution help your business be more secure -- and productive? Today's business environment is anything but simple – and increased cyber threats just complicate things more. For employees to work efficiently and securely, you need to know who they are and what they need to access, so employees can connect seamlessly to the tools they need while you maintain oversight and control of their access. In other words, you need an identity solution. But what is identity, and what do you need to know about investing in a solution? And when it comes to SMBs, how might they approach identity management differently than a large enterprise? To help, we've crafted an introductory guide to explain key concepts around identity and access management, so you can feel more confident when you're ready to explore or trial an identity solution. Download the free guide to learn: Why identity matters How an identity solution addresses key challenges The benefits you can expect from an identity solution Overviews of Single Sign-On, Enterprise Password Management, and Multifactor Authentication Why SMBs need an all-in-one identity solution Unable To Process Request Guide Identity 101 for SMBs: A Guide to the Benefits and Features of Identity Solutions Learn why Identity matters, what an Identity solution is, and how an Identity solution can help your business.
